messages.content: As your Conservative candidate for Southampton Test I am writing today to share my plan for our area and how we can make our city better together. On 8th June, you face an important choice that will have real consequences for your family, for our city and for our country - a strong Government led by Theresa May, or the threat of a weak and unstable coalition led by Jeremy Corbyn. I moved to Southampton to attend the University, and having worked here for most of my adult life, I understand the challenges facing the city and the problems local people encounter every day. My plan for Southampton addresses these concerns. With a strong Government and a dedicated local MP, I think we can make things better in Southampton for everyone. My plan for Southampton includes five commitments to you. The choice at this election is clear; backing Theresa May and myself you will be voting for the best deal for Britain and a brighter future for Southampton. I very much hope that I can count on your support on June 8th.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A strong national and local economy
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We need a strong economy to deliver more employment and highly-skilled jobs. This will ensure local people have the opportunity to buy a home, get on or succeed in life.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: The best Brexit deal for Southampton
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I voted to leave the European Union because it allows our country to forge its own future. As your MP, my priority would be to ensure that Southampton benefits directly from this deal and that our local businesses prosper.

We need to make sure that everyone in Southampton has the opportunity to make the most of their talents and that hard work is rewarded. This means raising educational standards in our city's schools, more apprenticeships and promoting the strengths of our local and world leading university.

A strong economy is the only way we can afford high quality public services. The Conservatives have committed to an £8 billion increase in funding for our NHS. Which means more doctors and more nurses in our hospitals and better care for you and your family.
As your Conservative Member of Parliament, I will ensure that Southampton gets the very best deal from Government. I will be your voice in Westminster, not Westminster's voice in Southampton.
